ca.ualberta.lard.Stretchy

Class StretchyClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.lard.Stretchy.StretchyClient

  • public class StretchyClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The StrechyClient is a barebones REST client for Elastic Search. While some already exists, getting maven working was a good deal harder than just writing one myself.
    Author:
    Troy Pavlek

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StretchyClient()
      Constructor to intialize the Gson worker and the Apache HttpClient.

    • Method Detail

      • getById

        public Comment getById(java.lang.String id)
        Gets a particular comment by its ID.

        Queries Elastic Search for a resource of type comment matching the provided ID.

        Parameters:
        id - ID of the Comment the client is searching for
        Returns:
        Comment if found, null otherwise

      • save

        public StretchyResponse save(Comment comment)
        Saves a Comment to Elastic Search.
        Parameters:
        comment - The comment that the user wishes to save over the network
        Returns:
        StretchyResponse containing the server's response.

      • update

        public StretchyResponse update(Comment comment)
        Updates a comment Elastic Search.
        Parameters:
        comment - The comment that the user wishes to save over the network
        Returns:
        StretchyResponse containing the server's response.

      • search

        public java.util.ArrayList<Comment> search(SearchRequest req)
        Search elastic search and find an ArrayList of Comments.
        Parameters:
        req - A SearchRequest whose fields specify the objects and values that the user wishes to search for
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Comments embodying the results. May be empty, which should be checked on the client side.
